headline: RBC Capital Initiates Pfizer (PFE) with $25 Target, Warns of Structural Revenue Headwinds
summary: Pfizer Inc. (NYSE:PFE) is included among the 14 Best Affordable Dividend Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. On February 25, RBC Capital initiated coverage of Pfizer Inc. (NYSE:PFE) with an Underperform rating and a $25 price target. The firm said its outlook reflects an “insurmountable” $15B-$20B revenue decline expected through 2030, with limited visibility into […]
